roleset.name: cause embarrassment
roleset.note: CHAGRIN-V NOTES: Frames file for 'chagrin' based on internet usage examples, membership in VN. Verbnet entry 31.1. Comparison with 'embarrass.' (from chagrin.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: Passive
example.text: [John]-1, confused and chagrined *-1, left the room.
